word_mean: 呼吸器，通风机：一种设计用于提供适宜空气以资吸入或以间歇或持续方式辅助或控制肺换气的装置

sentence.Network_en: He was put on a ventilator.

entry.def: A ventilator is a machine that helps people breathe when they cannot breathe naturally, for example because they are very ill or have been seriously injured.
A ventilator is a device that lets fresh air into a room or building and lets old or dirty air out.

means.word_mean: 1. a device (such as a fan) that introduces fresh air or expels foul air
2. a device that facilitates breathing in cases of respiratory failure
